lines.text: in a for loop , change i from 0 to n exclusive incrementing i
lines.code: for ( int i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ )

lines.text: if length of s is greater than 10
print s [ 0 ] , length of s - 2 , s [ length of s - 1 ] and a new line
lines.code: cout << s [ 0 ] << s . size ( ) - 2 << s [ s . size ( ) - 1 ] << endl ;
